name: Tamer Got Stuck Inside A Dungeon
name_original: Tamer Got Stuck Inside A Dungeon
description:
Overview :

Join an Anime-esque adventure as a Tamer who fell down a hole (UNderTAlE??!!!??1?) and got stuck in a Dungeon! He can only tame slimes, as he is still low level, but ain't no mob gonna stop this guy from escapin' ! A fresh take on Very frantic and sastifying shooter rpg dunger crawler rougelike thing jimagabob.

This will soon be the full version of the game, heres a somewhat Beta Version for now!
_______________________________________________________________________________
Controls :

WASD - Move
Space - Jump/Dodge Enemy
LMB - Swing/Tame Slimes
RMB - Spin

Pls support the game if you want to see the full version comes out!
